mapper.select: SELECT a.review_id AS reviewId, a.strf_id AS strfId, a.content, a.user_id AS writerUserId, a.rating, c.name AS writerUserName, c.profile_pic AS writerUserPic, b.title AS strfTitle , (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM review WHERE user_id = a.user_id) AS userWriteReviewCnt, COALESCE(a.updated_at, a.created_at) AS reviewWriteDate, rp.`title` AS pic FROM review a LEFT JOIN user c ON a.user_id = c.user_id LEFT JOIN review_pic rp ON a.review_id = rp.review_id LEFT JOIN stay_tour_restaur_fest b ON a.strf_id = b.strf_id WHERE a.strf_id = #{strfId} ORDER BY a.review_id DESC LIMIT #{startIdx}, #{size}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO review (content, rating, strf_id, user_id) VALUES (#{req.content}, #{req.rating}, #{req.strfId}, #{userId})
mapper.select: SELECT a.review_id AS reviewId, a.content, c.profile_pic AS writerUserPic, a.rating, a.strf_id AS strfId, c.name AS writerUserName, b.title AS pic, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM review WHERE user_id = #{userId}) AS userWriteReviewCnt, COALESCE(a.updated_at, a.created_at) AS reviewWriteDate FROM review a LEFT JOIN review_pic b ON a.review_id = b.review_id LEFT JOIN user c ON a.user_id = c.user_id WHERE a.user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY a.review_id DESC , a.created_at DESC LIMIT #{startIdx}, #{size}
